metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6802 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache Shiro before 1.3.2 allows attackers to bypass intended servlet filters and gain access by leveraging use of a non-root servlet context path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-2').
